alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 11:11AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower with gusty winds and small hail will impact portions of southeastern Marin County through 1145 AM PDT... At 1111 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Muir Beach, or 8 miles southwest of San Rafael, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Rafael, Mill Valley, San Anselmo, Larkspur, Corte Madera, Tiburon, Fairfax, Sausalito, Kentfield, Tamalpais-Homestead, Strawberry, Muir Beach, Tamalpais-Homestead Valley, Stinson Beach, Ross, Belvedere, Santa Venetia and Bolinas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys
